question: 素人
sourceMnemonic: You've got a very <kanji>element</kanji>al <kanji>person</kanji>. They're so elementary that they're quite an <vocabulary>amateur</vocabulary>, really. Maybe a little too elemental.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
Unfortunately, the reading for this is a complete exception, so you'll just have to memorize it. Here's a mnemonic to help you:

"You're an <vocabulary>amateur</vocabulary>!", <reading>she wrote</reading> (しろうと). A little harsh, isn't it? But that's what she wrote. Gotta do a little better to impress her, pal.
